parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unavailability of replacement parts for the Takata airbag recall can leave drivers and passengers at risk of serious injury or death in the event of an accident, as the faulty airbags may not deploy properly or may deploy unexpectedly.
symptoms: as the issue is related to the unavailability of parts for a recall repair.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the passenger headlight low beam reflector can cause reduced visibility at night, making it difficult to see and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The headlight reflector is burnt out
the plastic material is melted due to heat from the bulb
and the light output is reduced.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the side mirrors can cause reduced visibility, making it difficult to see other vehicles and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The side mirrors fade into a brown color
and the front light keeps going out or falling out of the hole
causing the indicator light to come on.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear lamps and wiring can cause reduced visibility, making it difficult to see and increasing the risk of accidents, and can also cause electrical fires.
symptoms: The rear lamps do not work
and the plastic insulation is deteriorated

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the VANOS system can cause catastrophic engine damage, leading to costly repairs and potentially leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: but upon removal of the valve cover
which can enter the timing chain and cause the engine to seize. The vehicle may experience sudden and catastrophic engine failure
